Class SoftwareSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • iteration2.SoftwareSimulator

  • public class SoftwareSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class SoftwareSimulator. This is the main software class which acts upon the hardware class. It instantiates the necessary objects and registers listeners as needed
